20101213025349.125|20101213025349.750|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101213025349.750|20101213025350.375|CCO|
20101213025350.375|20101213025351.000|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101213025351.000|20101213025351.714|CCO|    
20101213025351.714|20101213025352.429|CCO|        so tell your doctor
20101213025352.429|20101213025353.143|CCO|    
20101213025353.143|20101213025353.857|CCO|      when planning surgery.
20101213025353.857|20101213025354.571|CCO|        
20101213025354.571|20101213025355.286|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101213025355.286|20101213025356.000|CCO|    
20101213025356.000|20101213025356.714|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101213025356.714|20101213025357.429|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101213025357.429|20101213025358.143|CCO|    
20101213025358.143|20101213025358.857|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101213025358.857|20101213025359.571|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101213025359.571|20101213025400.286|CCO|    
20101213025400.286|20101213025401.000|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101213025401.000|20101213025401.769|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101213025401.769|20101213025402.538|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
20101213025402.538|20101213025403.308|CCO|    
20101213025403.308|20101213025404.077|CCO|      a rare but potentially
20101213025404.077|20101213025404.846|CCO|
